about_the_game:
Welcome to Vertig8.

A third person shooter. This is about a Last Team Standing game featuring parodies of internet celebrities fighting, striving to survive at the zenith. In the towering heights of the digital skyscraper, Vertig8 unfolds as a dynamic multiplayer experience unlike any other. Players explore the intricacies of a skyscraper, with every floor and room ripe for discovery and conquest. The game offers a unique blend of strategic gameplay and heart-pounding action, challenging players to outmaneuver their opponents in a vertiginous environment.

In this edition, we have added several new features to enhance your gaming experience. Dark Ambients add a chilling atmosphere, requiring the use of flashlights to navigate the darkest corners of the skyscraper. The gameplay is more reactive and hardcore, where a single decision could mean the difference between life or death. Additionally, we have introduced new weapons, items, and challenges to keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.

Vertig8 is not just a game; it's an immersive journey into the world of competitive gaming. Are you ready to conquer the heights and become the ultimate internet celebrity?
